document.full_text: the death toll from the monster tornado that tore through joplin on sunday rose to 132 on friday after six more victims were identified, joplin city manager mark rohr said.
document.title: joplin tornado death toll rises to 132
lines_and_colors: the death toll from the monster tornado that tore through joplin on sunday rose to 132 on friday after six more victims were identified, joplin city manager mark rohr said.
